DOC.brief_summary: The study aim evaluate neuropsychological disorder CABG patient . Measurements perform 1 day , 6 day , 6 month 3-5 year surgery . The relation cerebrovascular reactivity embolic load ( measure transcranial Doppler Ultrasonography ) evaluate . Two surgery technique ( on- off-pump CABG ) compare .
DOC.brief_title: Changes Cerebrovascular Reactivity During Cognitive Activation After Cardiopulmonary Bypass : Relation With Intraoperative Embolic Load Postoperative Neuropsychological Dysfunctions
DOC.criteria: CABGpatients ( urgent ) < 70 year old Righthanded Neurological psychiatric disease Psychoactive medication Valve operation
